links_reviews_title: Don’t do it unless you are tiny!

links_reviews_title: Like the idea not a great fit

these paired so perfectly with all of my favorite sweaters. a little form fitting, but not at all tight. honestly they were so comfy, and a perfect fall to winter pant

The pants fit great, I usually order size 4 but size 2 was only available and they still fit well since it has a lot of stretch. The ankle cut and high waist with the warm lining made me love them. However i was really disappointed with the colors just was hard to style
Have rented these twice in a row since they’re so comfy. The kick flare is super cute and adds some interest to a look

These pants are so soft on the inside, and although theres no adjustable waist due to the zip closure, they fit perfectly true to size. Styled with a neon pink or yellow crop top, but could definitely go with a plain black or white fitted t-shirt!
These pants are super comfy and flattering to wear! I like how easy they were to pair with any cute top in my wardrobe. While I did love them, the pink color in them made me not want to keep.

links_reviews_title: So comfy and able to be worn a multitude of ways
links_reviews_text: I loved these pants. They stretch great, so I'd size down if you want them to be fitted in the waist+butt. I'll be renting them again in an XS instead of a S!
so comfy and so cute
Fits as expected. There is a slight gap in the back of the waistline.

Love these pants! They have a good stretch to them and make the bum look good. They are fuzzy on the inside which was a total bonus for making them a little cozier. Unfortunately the clasp fell off of the zipper part but other than that they were great! Definitely a shorter pant so be prepared to show some calf (how scandalous!)

links_reviews_title: Cute but didn't love the color
links_reviews_text: These pants are really high waisted and stretchy which I liked. They also have a bit of a fuzzy lining inside so seem like the perfect fall pant. However the colorway wasn't what I expected -- I thought it would be a classic plaid, but it has more pink in it, which really isn't my style. I also felt like because the pants are so form-fitting, they hugged my mid section in a way I didn't find to be super flattering. I feel like I would get these pants if they had them in black!

links_reviews_title: Great pants, not for me though
links_reviews_text: Ever since I rented the first pair of jeans from Agolde here on Nuuly, I became obsessed with the brand. The quality is impeccable and I loved how the Remy jeans fit me, so I decided to give these a try. This model wasn't very flattering on my body type, I have thick legs but they're very straight, I don't have much change in girth from my thighs all the way down to my ankles, and these pants made my legs look wider than they are if that makes any sense... They didn't work for me, but I'm sure they would look wonderful in other body types.
Agolde jeans are amazing but the waist varies. These were borderline too tight in the waist
Absolutely perfect jeans

links_reviews_title: Cute but get your normal size!
links_reviews_text: Quality is great, I read some reviews and ordered one size down and they were a little tight, would go with my normal size next time. Also I'm 5'9 and they are a little short but that was expected.
Super cute, though I have large calves and it was almost to the point of not fitting in that area. Would buy!
I didn't love the wash, they look a bit more like green/dirty in person. The waist is a good fit but like all Agolde jeans they do stretch out on the legs significantly with each wear.

links_reviews_title: Great high-waisted, comfy but cute jean

links_reviews_title: My new fav pair of spring/summer jeans!
links_reviews_text: This are perfect for everyday or for going out! I have shorter legs and a bigger butt and they fit in all the right places!

Cute style but the legs were extremely wide.
The perfect high-waisted fit. They didn't stretch out after wearing them like so many jeans do! Will definitely be renting them again. :)
Great jeans but run a little large. I usually wear a 26 but should have sized down to 25.
Not 100% denim, had a bit of stretch but looked like mom jeans. Not the cute kind. They did run true to size.
Love the rise! Nice and high! Good stretch. I needed a size down, runs big. Great everyday jeans.
Too small in the waist for me-I could have worn them but it wouldn’t have been very comfortable.
I thought I would love these because I have the same style in another wash, but these fit differently and were very meh.

links_reviews_title: There are better mom jeans out there

links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 28-29 depending on brand, and got these in a 28. They are very stretchy, so they bagged out quickly and didn't regain shape between wears. I loved being able to try this style without committing. I sized up based on other reviews and they fit great so I'd agree with everyone else that they run small. I would have worn these even more if they weren't a little long on me (5'3). I always had to wear with a heeled boot or cuff them.
Too small

Great fit, nice and roomy but still a nice straight fit. The high-waistedness is crazy on these. Good overall for me!
these jeans are SO SOFT! they fit well and are super flattering. i love where they hit me (i am 6 ft tall).

I loved these jeans! They fit very true to size and are super high waisted which I love as I have a longer torso. They go with everything and are super comfortable. They do stretch as you wear them, as most jeans do, so I definitely wouldn't size up or anything.
Good pair of basic jeans. Nothing fancy but great for everyday wear. Good staple piece.
These are the jeans I have been looking for for months!! The perfect straight leg jean. Actually long enough to not feel cropped on me. I ended up buying these because I couldn't let go of them.

links_reviews_title: The perfect length fun pair of jeans!
links_reviews_text: Loved the length and shape of these jeans, the pinched waist and high rise was flattering. Been searching for the perfect pair of very high waisted straight leg jeans with a little stretch. These are everything. I bought them and wear them multiple times a week.
Loved the wash on this Jean, super high rise and very versatile

I have rented other Agolde jeans and loved them. These ones did not do it for me. Honestly they reminded me of a boot cut jean I would get from like old navy in the early 2000s. Even when standing I did not think they were very flattering. I think they would work for some people, but not for me.
Loved the look and length, but didn't fit as I'd hoped.

Exactly how high rise kick flares should fit. Comfy too!
I own 2 pairs of Agolde jeans that look great on me. I thought these would be similar. Didn’t do anything for my figure. After trying them on, didn’t wear them.
Solid, basic jeans. Good high waist. The kick flare doesn't have much flare to it - more like a straight leg.

Wore them, loved them, but they felt a little baggy in certain places, so I didn't keep them. Would recommend renting for an extra pair to have in rotation, but not if you're looking for the best jeans ever 😊
Extra high waist, super flattering and most importantly: comfortable! I rented this pair two months in a row and then decided I had to keep them. So excited to add these to my denim collection!
Honestly, these are perfect. Rented them three times now so just waiting for a good discount!

Loved the color and style but ran small

Really great pair of basic jeans, if you want them to fit snuggly I recommend sizing down a lot. I'm usually around a 27, sometimes a 28 in smaller brands and I got these in a 26. They were tough to get on at first but then stretched out and fit perfectly. I had ordered the 27 last time and they stretched out a lot and I couldn't wear them again.
extremely flattering on, a little tight in my waist but they were ok. would say make sure u check sizing before getting these

Hands down the perfect jean. I love a high waist and the quality of AGOLDE has always been my favorite. I’m a jean freak, both new and vintage, and these are my new favs. First day I wasn’t feeling them but after one wear they’re a dream.
I wore these all. the. time. Super comfy, rinds true to size. A little tight in the belly area as I’m 2 month postpartum, but tolerable. I’m 5’10” and these fit right above the ankles

I'm 5'5'' and I wore them with heeled booties which solved the length problem.
I really love these jeans. They fit great and are very flattering. I love how the zipper looks too - it's longer than most high-waisted jeans.
Jeans definitely had stretch which was super nice. Wash isn’t my favorite but overall jeans fit beautifully and were a 10/10!
Received several compliments on the bootcut look of these. Paired with a sweater for casual work look.

Love these jeans. I usually struggle finding pants that fit in the waist and hips and while they are slightly tight in the hips, they fit my waist perfectly and have enough stretch that I don't mind. Ended up keeping them :)
Beautiful jeans but they didnt fit it was too tight
Love AGOLDE jeans and glad I rented these to try. The “pinch waist” is no joke so they’re not the most comfortable to wear but they are on trend 90’s jeans that go with many outfits.

I really liked these pants, but based on the reviews I sized up. I should have gone with my true size.
I'm obsessed with these. This is the 2nd time getting them and I still love them just as much. They're very true to size and fit great!

The style runs large. Size down.

links_reviews_title: Too Tight! Cause I’m Thicker than a Snickers

links_reviews_text: Didn’t wear it

links_reviews_text: I am 5' 6" but sadly have short legs. These fit me like bootcut jeans I had in 7th grade that I tried to wear to school in 8th grade after growing 2 inches over the summer.

If I owned them, I would have them hemmed an inch or two to make them perfect.

Where have these jeans been all my life? I struggle to find a pair of jeans that fit my thighs without gaping in the waist, and these are perfect for anyone that has wider hips / thighs. I'm usually between a 27 and 28 and the 27 fit perfectly, could not be happier with these jeans.

All in all, a great pair of jeans and I would definitely try this brand again!

links_reviews_title: Thick thighs? This is a win!

links_reviews_title: True fit & modern cut, just not my favorite
links_reviews_text: I was excited to try these b/c I had read good things and came close to buying a pair before I saw them on Nuuly. They fit perfectly, true to size, comfortable. Absolutely love these jeans. They are a pinch waist so they worked perfectly for me because I’m in between a 27/28 because I have wide hips / thighs but these worked at the 28 size. Love the way they look on a taller leg because they have a slight crop and flare.

Couldn't wear bc I am too self concious of my stomach - the cut was not good for my figure. Also, the arms are too long for me...

loved this one! would definitely recommend renting. fit true to size.

I was drawn to the colors in this sweater so I snagged it and now I’m obsessed. It’s super cute styled casual AND dressed up a bit. It did run a little big for me but overall I was really happy with it.

links_reviews_text: I am a big fan of loose, easy caftan style dresses during the extra-humid Philadelphia summer. With an easy fit and dropped armholes, this one fits the bill. I recommend wearing with a cute bandeau or bralette because the sides are a bit open. It looks great with a flatform sandal. I am 5'6' and this hit me mid-calf.

The belt is also bizarrely long and wraps all the way around to the middle, back belt loop. Why provide such a long belt when the skirt can only accommodate a 25–26" waist in XS? And why won't the buckle sit straight but always tilts to the side? I was also a little disappointed in the fabric, which I expected to be more structured. It's pretty drapy and flannel-like, which just makes it look a little Holly Hobbie.

I wasn't sure about the color of this dress but I received so many compliments when I wore this that I considered keeping it! It is really comfortable and easy to wear. I ordered the XS, but I think the Small would have been a better fit.
This dress is super comfortable and can be easily dressed up and dressed down - However, the bust runs smaller so the fit is weird if you have more of a curvy figure.
Fit is comfortable and easy. A great throw on and go dress, no fuss.
Really cute for petite frames - very short and tight in the chest but it worked. Perfect for a summer night!

Wore this top on vacation. It’s a bit heavy for a hot day. Also the boning in the shirt was popping out in several places and was really scratchy. Glad I got to try before buying. I’m 5’9” and thought the length was fine if you treat it like a tunic or wear shorts underneath.
The bust is tight, but other than that it was a cute, fun vacation dress!

I rented this dress for a trip to Colombia and boy did it work out perfectly. I got a ton of compliments and it totally suited the vibe of the location. It was easy to throw on quickly and look cute for the day. I usually would have ordered a small but they only had a medium, which worked out but it did keep slipping throughout the day. 10/10 for this stunner!

what a cute idea for a dress. but man oh man this dress came in my box and i was like omg i didn't know nuuly did kids clothes. haha i mean it was just wicked short and the material was pretty paper-y. If you're on the shorter side I'd say MAYBE give it a go

Wore this for vacation in Mexico and it was perfect for the occasion. It’s extremely short however, so I can’t imagine being able to wear this other than for the beach really. (Also a little annoying to take off!)
Super cute dress for a vacation. But it's very short for tall girls.
Super cute on, just needed to be a tad longer. Or wear with flats/sandals. I wore with the tall wedges I brought on vacation and it was a tad short. I'm only 5'5". Other than that it was perfect!

The print on this dress is so fun. A little loose on the bust, but that was expected as I ordered a medium. I liked this dress a lot, paired it with combat boots to a festival to tone it down a bit. Definitely has that big poofy babydoll fit so if you're ok with that, I recommend!

This dress is super gorgeous and fits like a glove on petite frames. The fruit print is really fun and unique, and its the perfect little number to wear out on a sunny day. I got tons of compliments- definitely something I would rent again and see myself buying.

I'm short and this dress was short on me- keep this in mind! I would say it hit me thigh. For someone over 5'5", I don't think you could wear this and not flash everyone! Additionally, the top part is not meant for someone with a really large chest. It's not made to accommodate anything much larger than a C, would be my guess. The dress is really cute though, the print is great and it's a fun dress. I did feel the boning cut in under my arms a bit but nothing unbearable.
Love the fruit print and it’s perfect for summer. Even though it fit TTS, the bust area is for sure small/tight.
Normally a small and they only had a medium! still fit really well (would still have gotten a small if available).

The fruit print and feminine silhouette really sold me on this dress, I was really disappointed when it didn't fit me properly. There isn't a lot of coverage in the chest area which I struggled with. It was a little snug getting it on and off and I ordered it my typical size. I might try to rent it again one size up because I love the print so much!
This was such a great piece. So easy and dressy all at the same time. Very tempted to keep it. It was comfortable with a 5 month bump, but would look great post natal as well.
This was a cute top, I loved that the sleeves were a different material. A little snug on my 34DDD/F chest but still fit. Would size up if you have a larger chest!
Loved this. Really flattering. I have a larger chest and this type of shirt always makes me nervous but it fit great and I felt great in it!
I loved this top and probably should have kept it. It was super comfortable and flattering- snug around the chest, looser around the belly. Definitely recommend.

I was a bit disappointed when I realized there are two different fabrics on this shirt- I thought it was all sheer. That said, it fit really well and I loved that I could wear it on or off the shoulders, taking it from day time to night time easily.

In my mind, this was going to be a slightly dressier top. The material on the arms is really lovely and expensive feeling. I wish that the same material could have been used on the body. The body is a cotton, softer material that is more casual. I still liked this top, I just had to adjust what I planned on wearing it to. I paired with some long bellbottom jeans.

I liked it but I wish I had sizes up one because it felt tight in the bust and I don’t have a big one! The material was a little lower quality than I had hoped for. Wore it to a dinner with skinny jeans.
Versatile top that can be dressed up or down. Sleeves are chiffon and bodice is knit. Ended up buying this one.
I never wore because there was a tear in the sleeve and it was starting to pill a bit in the body. Just seemed very cheap fro Anthro.
So comfy, cute and flattering. Love!
This top is super flattering, comfortable, and versatile. I wore it to a casual rehearsal dinner and also just for walking around during the weekend. Highly recommend!

This top is gorgeous and super flattering. I wore it to an engagement party and received a lot of compliments! The middle part is stretchy, but the sleeves have zero stretch. I found that the sleeves were big enough that it wasn't an issue.
VERY cute blouse that I was able to wear for a lot of different occasions. I would have considered buying, but the fabric started falling apart around the shoulders almost immediately.

I go between Medium and Large Tops and am glad that I went Large on this one. A Medium would have probably worked but the sleeve length and tightness on my shoulders was perfect in the Large. You can wear this Off-the Shoulder or with the straps up, very versatile! I also liked the sheer sleeves mixed with the knit body.
Love this skirt so much I bought it. Easy to dress up or down!! Great with a T-shirt and sandals or button down for work!

links_reviews_title: Stretchy, Breathable, and Makes a Statement
links_reviews_text: Loved the print on this dress. Looks exactly like pictured. It is a skirt meant to be worn high-waisted and does have a zipper so that it's not super form fitting but just gives the illusion.
Very cute, a little long
Beautiful skirt - I styled it exactly like the model. However, the colors were a bit faded. This was the only piece I’ve ordered that really looked even remotely run down and like a rental.

I love Farm Rio and have a few of their skirts. Liked this skirt very much...although the fabric is super stretchy and if you have any jiggle anywhere ya gotta get your spanx on with this one. I paired it with a chunky black sweater and platform boots as it was super long. Very unique skirt and comfortable for sure.
I loved this skirt. Worked well with my height and received a number of compliments. I wore tights underneath because it is pretty lightweight, but that worked perfectly.
I loved the pattern on this skirt. I was super excited to try it, however it is super big. This would work if I had sized down 1 to 2 sizes. My advice if you try this size all the way down.
I was able to wear this by rolling it up and the waist and tying a button down over it. It looked cool but it was just so so long.
I love the skirt. It runs really long but I rolled it up at the waist. I got many compliments on it.
This fit well, but I’m tall. Average and shooter girls might find this too long. I would have given this 5 stars, but the fabric was a tad thin.
I was not expecting this smock material but it was cute! It was very comfortable. Since this service has maternity clothes, this is a great one for a little growing bump!

links_reviews_title: Perfect skirt for casual or not wear
links_reviews_text: This skirt can get away with a casual top and you can wear during the day. Up close the skirt fabric is not fancy and is super comfortable. And then at night you can dress it up. What a statement piece! Also plenty of stretch so you can size down for a more sexy look!

I like this so much I got it twice in two months. The large was enormous so I got the medium. That was still a bit on the large side but close enough. I will wear Spanx underneath because the fabric, although lovely, is very unforgiving of bumps and lumps. I’m happy I bought it.
This skirt is tight, like the reviews state, but has a lot of give. I loved the design on this and it was great for work or a night out.

Loved it! Fabric is fantastic, waffle type, so even though it fits like an hour glass, it doesn't show any bumps or underwear lines, and I didn't need a slip. I wore with with a black button down and a white button down blouse knotted under my bust. Every time I wore it people stopped me to ask where in the world I found it. Fit was great, for me it was to the floor but worked fine with boots and heels.

I am tall and relatively thin but this just hugged too much for me. If you are at all self-concious of your curves, I would avoid this piece. While pretty and different I just couldn't get myself to wear it!

links_reviews_title: I sooo wanted to love it
links_reviews_text: This might actually be the reason I signed up for Nuuly. I saw this skirt and loved it, online. It is a smocked stretchy skirt in reality and I didn't think it was as cute IRL. It is also just way too long. I didn't even realize there was a zipper on the side until half way through the day, when I felt it re-rolling the falling waist. The cute tucked in shirt in the picture would be impossible unless you are about 6 feet tall. I'm 5'6" and rolled it at least three times. I love peacocks so I tried to enjoy it for the one day, but I never wanted to put it back on thereafter. Oh well, not everything works out, but I loved the picture.
Super comfy and easy to wear but it def hugs those curves!
I loved this skirt but it ran big, especially around the waist. It is long, I’m almost 6am, but beautiful. However it was too large, the waist was enormous and it kept slipping down.
I would have worn this more grab once if it wasn’t so distinctive. Very long, even with the xxspetite. I almost kept this one and I’m now regretting it!

links_reviews_title: Roll it up or pull it up
links_reviews_text: This skirt is beautiful but it ways way too big around the waist and too long. I’m 5’7 and I had to roll it up two or three times depending on the heels I was wearing. I tucked it into a pair of spanks once and then used a belt to hold it up under the roll once. You could pull it up and wear it as a strapless dress and it would be super cute. I got lots of compliments on it after I figured out how to make it work.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for dressing up or a more casual look
links_reviews_text: I loved this skirt! I paired it with the Midnight Vibes Blouse by Free People (also from Nuuly) to a wedding and got SO many compliments. The top is cropped so it met the waistline of the skirt perfectly and many thought it was a dress. I also paired it with a vintage Harley Davidson T-Shirt with a leather Jacket for a more casual look. The material is super stretchy and kind if thin so even though it’s patterned you may see lumps and bumps if you don’t wear spanks. That said, its super versatile and comfy. It does stretch out pretty easily so I’d keep that in mind. It’s also pretty long so plan to wear heels or folding the band inward and blousing a top over it.
The print was interesting, it was just so curve hugging I could not wear it to work, which was what I wanted. It just wasn’t for me. It was loooong

This skirt was so comfortable-the material is super super soft. It has absolutely no structure on its own, so if you don’t like clingy things...stay away. I wore it on the plane and it was perfect. I’m 5’6 and I rolled it one or two times in order to get the length right.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous print, but will only fit 6ft or taller.
links_reviews_text: This skirt was meant for someone with a very curvy frame or who is 6ft without heels on. At least 6 inches too long for my 5'5 frame. I adore the print, super chic and the fabric is very cozy. Just a shame the sizing is so off.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful statement skirt, but way too long
links_reviews_text: I loved the print of this skirt and got so many compliments on it. As other reviewers have said, it's just way too big. I ordered the large petite, and it was dragging on the floor and the waist was too large. I would definitely recommend sizing down. It was so lovely, though, that I wore it a few times. I didn't style it much -- just a black shirt with metallic Birkenstocks for a fun fall/summer look.
The skirt is a great material and the pattern is gorgeous. The issue was length. I pulled it up to my armpits.
It does run very long. I am 5'6 and wore wedges and it was perfect length though. Super unique and pretty !
It is almost a “popcorn” type material. The print is the same but it wasn’t a smooth texture.

Super fun texture and soft comfortable material. Love the print and colors. I am tall and used to things being too short on me but this had to be pulled up under my boobs so it wasn’t too long. Kind of the perfect Nuuly item for tall girls though.

I'm 5'7 and I ordered the Petite length after reading reviews. It was still too long for me! The print is fantastic, but the fabric felt cheap to me. It has a pebbly texture that reminded me of 90s popcorn shirts. With those complaints, the print is a showstopper and its very comfortable and stretchy.
I’m 5’7” and this skirt was so long I actually had to double check the website to make sure it was a skirt. It dragged on the floor when I had it pulled up like a strapless

I absolutely loved this skirt! I received so many compliments every time I wore it. I did not purchase the skirt due to the length. I received a petite but it was still definitely too long. (I'm a whopping 5'3" on a good day). Other than that, it would've been an essential piece for my closet.

links_reviews_title: Stretchy skirt with a fabulous pattern.
links_reviews_text: Loved the comfort of this skirt. I wore to work with a skinny stripe tank and white vest to make it casual.

I ordered the petite since I'm a shorter gal and it still dragged on the floor. I was able to make it work by rolling the waist and wearing a top that hid it, but this pulled the graphic up a bit high. I love the graphic - just wish that a petite was actually a petite! Tons of compliments.

I have seen a few ladies comment that this skirt runs long and to accommodate for that, others have worn it as a dress. I tried this look but my broad shoulders and large chest didn’t work. I’m guessing that this piece will work better for someone taller and thinner than me.

links_reviews_title: So Cute For Night Out in Cold Weather
links_reviews_text: This is so cute to wear when its cold out! It's hard finding cute tops for the winter, but this definitely fit the bill. At the time I ordered a Small because it was the only size available. I am glad I got a small and not an xs!
Really cute top, definitely recommend. Easy to style with high-waisted jeans.

I loved this top! I had my eye on it for a few months and it was never available in my size so I was really excited when I finally snagged it. I wore it twice, both nights out in NYC. It gets chilly in the winter so it’s nice to have something long sleeve. The subtle sheerness and cropped length make it perfect for a night out.
Need to have no boobs to wear

I thought this was going to be super see through but to my surprise it wasn’t. The sleeves were the stylish puffed look and it was very breathable but warm for a mid 70 degree day. Wanted to purchase this one badly.

I absolutely love this top. My chest is larger, so it was slightly more snug than I would prefer, but the waist and arms fit perfectly, so I just made it work. This could be a staple in a capsule wardrobe. It’s so classic and fun!
Fit perfectly. LOVE the dramatic sleeves. Little more see through than I was expecting but I was into it.

I love this top so much but I ordered the wrong size :( I'm 5'1 and normally wear a small or Xs top. Since the model is obviously way taller than me I thought I would get one size smaller than her, but it was too tight in the ribs. The third button barely reaches so there is a gap and it just looks too small. So bummed - I'll probably order again in a small because it's so cute
The material used was very scratchy by the end of the day. Not very comfortable . But the fit was great
Such an effortless look!
Wore this dress to brunch and work and received so many compliments! It did run a little big and the belt doesn’t stay put so I had to secure it to stay in place.
This dress is so flattering and slimming. Definitely recommend.

The dress is lovely. I have a bit too much boob and hip for it to look perfect but it is cute. I really had to squeeze into it and go bra-less, I was worried it would rip. One more thing, I decided to wear it on a flight and I held up the TSA Pre check line because of the belt. It set off the X-ray machine, 6x before we figured out it was the belt.
This dress was 1-2 sizes too small. I could not wear it.
I love this style of tee. It fit comfortably and let me show off my guns ;-)
Wore it a few times while bummin around the house or the park. Comfy and easy to wear.
I wanted to wear this so bad, I love Zep, but at the end of the day it looked terrible. I probably should have ordered a bigger size.
Fits well/slightly small. Love Led Zeppelin, so I kept it.
So soft. Fit great.
I would totally wear this again! It coordinates with almost everything. The sleeves are a little bit too deep under the arms. Otherwise it's great and I will consider buying it.
I tried it on and it got so well I purchased it! It does run slightly large which I was clearly okay with! Well made, quality feel. Happy I don’t have to send this one back ;)
This shirt was really soft, nicely cut and a high quality tshirt. It runs a little bit bigger than I expected so the arm holes were kind of baggy. I could have done a medium.
I love this shirt, bought it!
In love, so rad. Flattering fit.
I love the fit of this shirt, even though I rarely feel that the cut off t-shirt style looks good on me. I would buy it if it were more reasonably priced.
Loved this tee. Wore it to an Aerosmith concert in vegas of course.
Lived in this one. Comfy, cozy and just the right size
Great shirt, keeping it :)
Didn’t get a chance to wear it but I liked so much had to buy it. I will wear while traveling under a leather jacket or an all back and denim jacket look.
Loved this T-shirt and wore it out a few times. The sleeves fall just over the shoulder. I would have preferred sleeveless or short sleeves but it didn't stop me from wearing a bunch!
Love this tank so much I had to purchase! Great fit and really flattering.
Loved this T. Well made, soft material. Armholes weren't too deep, kept it appropriate. Ordered a small, would've preferred XS if it were an option.
LOVE! so soft, comfortable, and versatile. 10/10 would recommend!
So flattering. LOVED the color. Stood out on a ski trip among everyone else that was in neutral colors. Perfect for snow kept me warm also!
Looks great with high waisted jeans or leggings - a great fitted top

Paired it with a long houndstooth skirt and the neon pop was nice with the black and white skirt. But the turtle neck on its own is nothing special, the material is a cheaper one. Would only get this turtle neck if you have something in mind to pair it with.

links_reviews_title: The pop of color you didn't know you needed!
links_reviews_text: This top is surprisingly versatile for being such a bold color! I wore it with jeans, black dress pants, brown leather shorts, and an animal print skirt. It's super soft and comfy and of course the color wakes up any outfit you wear. Love love love!

I get tired of wearing black all the time so this was a fun way to mix it up but still be comfy in the winter. It’s a very soft material and runs a little larger than most shirts. I got a M and usually wear a S.

M Fit perfectly on me, stretched out a little bit only because I wore it so often. the color was perfect, not see through either, although still need to wear a skin color bra. Great by itself or layering!
This top is amazing but it wears and fits like a second skin, so confidence and the right undergarments are key.

A fun, bright piece. Was worried it’d be too tight, but it ran slightly big. Was expecting it’d be super tight, super spandex-y, but it’s soft and cotton-like with good length to it. Wore it with leather leggings and it was a fun look!
I loved the color of this top, so fun!

links_reviews_title: Such a fun pop of color
links_reviews_text: Loved this turtle neck! I’m usually a black white or Grey clothes girl so i needed some spice in my life! This sweater looked so cute with the capulet leopard pants! I wore it to work, to a Christmas party, and out and about! Love!! Makes your boobies look nice too

links_reviews_title: So Cute And Made Me Feel Like Timothée Chalamet
links_reviews_text: style with a blazer for maximum Chalamet. it's sooo soft and cozy. a little unforgiving when it comes to bra lines

links_reviews_title: Super cute - if you like color!
links_reviews_text: I thought this top was super cute and fit very well! I did not end up wearing it though because the color is very neon. I usually have an all black wardrobe so I couldn't muster up the courage to wear it out. Very flattering and cute on though!

I usually am a size xs but I knew I wanted to tuck it in and give it the illusion of a bodysuit, so I sized up! It still fit perfectly and was a little bit long but gave me the exact look I was going for! It was super comfy and I wore it a ton of times.
Not see-through like i thought! Really cool
Love this shirt! The fabric is very soft and flattering, which is good since it's a tight fitting shirt. I ended up reaching for this shirt a lot.
Fit was good, fabric is stretchy and the color is great. Also loved the mock neck!

Great pop of color! Wore it with dark jeans and leopard print flats for helping at school. I ordered a large as opposed to my usual medium because of the thin (But soft) material and color, I didn’t want it to be super tight. I wore a nude thin tank under to cover “flaws” and it was perfect. Great fun shirt to mix in. Especially as a rental!
I wish I had gotten the XS because the sleeve were just a bit too long, but I wore it anyways! Super cute and soft.
This was more of a sweater material almost than it looks like in the pictures but the tight fit made me feel sexy and I loved how the color popped.
Loved this! The color makes it really fun but it’s still super versatile. I wore it a few times. Definitely helped me get my fix of the neon trend.
Loved this top! Wish it were just a tad bit tighter, but the color was awesome!

links_reviews_title: 80s my little pony, in the best way
links_reviews_text: I loved this! The detailing is incredible- the stars are sparkly and fun, the hem was super cute. It was very comfy and felt special!

This fits really cute. I’m not at all a pink or sparkly person. I really don’t know why I rented this, and wonder if I would wear it if we were not social distancing. Besides that it is soft, and sweet, and cute and I feel really cozy and pretty like a unicorn when I’m wearing it around the house. It just might make me rethink pink.

links_reviews_title: loved her, said to see her go
links_reviews_text: This was actually a substitution and I was initially skeptical. I LOVED this sweater. It is SO soft, the color is so pretty, and the stars give it a little glam. I wore this endlessly for all sorts of (socially distanced) activities. Would have bought but too $$$, was a dream to own her for the month.
Soft sweater with unicorn vibes. Very cozy.
This is a beautiful cashmere sweater. I got a compliment from a stranger on the street and many others. Truly a beautiful sweater and so soft!

I wore it as pajamas / lounging clothes around the house and I just loved it. It's really too special for that but it's so incredibly comfortable and it made me feel luxurious and fancy with the sparkles. I would have worn it out if it had fit a little snugger but I kind of swam in it.
I lived in this!!!!!!! It is not only gorgeous, but it is gorgeous and different.
i thought this was a great sweater to wear. it is soooo soft and fun

links_reviews_title: Just the right amount of sparkle
links_reviews_text: The photos don’t do justice to how pretty this sweater is in person. I feared that the stars might look a little too glitzy, but they are subtle and wearable, even during the day. Being cashmere, it’s also warm. Even though I wore this sweater a few times, I never quite felt that I styled it correctly. That could be because it’s not normally a color I would wear. I still recommend it, though.

I loved this sweater! The cashmere is some of the softest I have ever worn and the star and sleeve details make it so fun! It does have a boxier fit, but I think that just added to the coziness. I got so many compliments and would highly recommend!
Adorable sweater - very comfy. Wore it out and to work and received a lot of compliments. I wanted to buy this before so was so happy I could rent it. Sweater was in good condition too
It wasn’t cold enough to wear it, but I planned on styling it with camo chinos. It looks very stylish and on trend. It would be a great addition to my quirky sweater collection.
Love this. The colored glittery stars are a little young, but I'm going with it. Love the raw hem and the unfinished contrast wrist openings.

This fit really well and was super elegant. The fabric is a bit stiff, but it didn't bother me when I tried it on. I didn't get to wear it because my event was cancelled, so I'll have to rent it again!
So upset that I didn’t get to wear this piece I might rent to buy again in the near future it fit so nicely
Runs very small, couldn’t zip up the back and usually Medium fits perfectly for me. Listen to the reviews and size up! Also was very itchy around the neckline.

links_reviews_title: Incredible dress, may be a challenge for petites
links_reviews_text: The quality of the embroidery on this dress is incredible. Unfortunately, I really run petite and there was too much room in the bust which created a weird bulge for me, so I couldn't wear it. If I was another inch or two taller, or had a bigger chest, I think it would have been perfect.
This dress is stunning and elegant! The detail of the flowers, the zipper, the tailoring are flawlessly executed. The length is perfect for shorties!
Loved this dress. Very classy. Usually wear a medium and this fit just a tad tight. Lovely detail.
Was so sad this was way too tight in my bust and zip up top back because the material, construction, and quality of garment was that of a $2000 dress. Really quite stunning.
I picked this for a black tie wedding but sadly didn’t get to wear because it didn’t zip up the back

links_reviews_title: This dress is beautiful and tiny.
links_reviews_text: I couldn't make this dress work, it was too small, runs two sizes smaller.
This dress was very beautiful in person but was sent to me by accident so I didn't try it on or wear it.
I wore this to my band mates wedding and looked cute and not generic and that makes me happy.

Wore this to a wedding and felt beautiful in it. When I first tried it on I was worried about the amount of material at the bottom, but as soon as I put heels on everything came together. I sized up based on previous reviews. It fit fine but there was plenty of room and could have worn a medium just as well.
I didn’t end up wearing this dress but it is beautiful! It’s a heavy dress, in a good way - it’s great quality. Will probably rent for another event or wedding!
This dress was pretty ill fitting on me. I'm a bit curvier and the top half was too long. I think if I was taller it would fit better. The bottom lace was a bit gothic and the dress was very heavy.
I sized up based on the reviews and it fit perfectly! I received so many compliments!
Beautiful detailed dress. Couldn't zip it up.
This dress is so pretty and it’s a great length. I got an xl and I’d guess it would probably fit a 12. I couldn’t get it zipped.

I LOVED this dress!! It was so classy and expertly designed. I wore this to a very formal wedding and it was perfect. The cut is super flattering and really accentuated my waist. The only thing to note is that the fabric on the high neckline is a tiny bit itchy, but once you start indulging in champagne, you don't even notice.
Wore this to a fall wedding and got tons of compliments. Very fun to dance in, but the lace at the neck and the zipper both chaffed, leaving me with red welts for a couple of days after.

I wore this dress to a wedding. It hit more like half-way down my calf. I paired it with nude heels. The dress can be a little hot to dance in, but not impossible! After wearing the dress for almost nine hours, the bottom of my neck had light bruise-like marks that went away after a few days. So be warned, the dress can start to get heavy. I would absolutely wear this dress again. It was perfect for the occasion and received lots of compliments.
Beautiful dress but definitely made for a certain body type, tall and thin.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but not flattering for my shape!
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful! It fit perfect at the top but could have been a little tighter in the waist and bottom area. I tried it on a couple of times for a wedding but didn't end up wearing it. It didn't do anything for my shape. Too much fabric at the bottom for me.

links_reviews_title: Truly stunning dress. The details of lace and embroidery were beautiful. Runs small around the waist. Size large worked for me as a size 10.
links_reviews_text: I had planned to wear for my anniversary dinner in Napa but the weather was too warm. So I dressed it down for work with a wrap sweater and quirky polka dot heels.

links_reviews_title: Prefect dress for a special occasion
links_reviews_text: I was lucky enough to have a wedding date when i received my first nuuly package and this was so perfect for the occasion. Its so well made, i love the floral embroidery and how it cinches at the waist to flatter my figure. Just so beautiful. I wish i didnt have to send it back

Really beautiful dress, but the fit was off for me. I have a very long torso, but the torso on this dress was still too long for me! It was also very tight on top. Wish I could have worn it because it is beautiful but just not the right fit for my body. FYI it is also very heavy!

I love this dress by the looks only. It's gorgeous and looks so luxe. However, it was super tight - I'm a true Medium and when I put this on I was able to zip it up all the way, but it looked like I was gonna bust out of it. It's also a little itchy, even if it fit right I don't think I could wear it for more than a couple hours without losing my mind.

Was in love with this dress online and even more in person. I wore it to a formal wedding in Nantucket in September. Strangers were complimenting me ALL night (one even said next to the bride, this was the most beautiful dress there). It fit very true to size, I am 5’8” though so keep that in mind if you’re a little shorter! One note: it is VERY heavy. So if you like lighter, flowy garments, this is NOT for you. Would rent again.

This dress is a work of art! From the lace to the embroidery, lining, layers of ruffle, and the finished seams, the construction of this dress is impeccable! It’s unique and flattering and I got endless compliments. So impressed with this one. You have to see it in person! I will say that there isn’t much elasticity in the waist. I got lucky that the waist was the right fit for me. Definitely recommend renting this piece!!

The photos do not do this dress justice, it's so eye catching; the embroidery is beautiful, the structure is amazing, I could go on. Being 5'1" this dress was the perfect length, closer to a maxi, hitting right at my ankles. Since I do have a shorter torso and wider hips, the apliqué that cinches the waist in did not hit at the right spot and cause the top portion to bunch in the back where the zipper is. If I was going to an event where I could wear a jacket or something to cover that up, you better believe I would have. Rent this dress!

I chose this dress for a cocktail event , hoping it’ll be as cute on me as the model but it just wasn’t meant to be . It was very large on me and almost a maxi length . I will say this is my first with this style of dress so maybe that’s why it wasn’t a match

The dress is well-made and looks expensive. It was too long and kind of bulky on me (I am 5.6"). It runs true to size, however, has no stretch. I usually wear an XS and this is what I got, the size was good.
